knowledge.bot_response: Hello! How can I assist you?
Hi there! What can I help you with?
I'm doing well, thank you! How can I assist you?
My name is ChatBot. What can I help you with?
Sure, what do you need help with?
My purpose is to assist you with any questions or issues you may have. How can I help you?
You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?

Discord is a VoIP and instant messaging social platform. Users have the ability to communicate with voice calls, video calls, text messaging, media and files in private chats or as part of communities called "servers"
